DataElement.preferredName: Symptom Assessment Questionnaire Other Symptom Report Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator that signifies whether or not the individual has other symptoms not previously reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Symptom Assessment Questionnaire Other Symptom Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
